definition: cigarette or pipe tobacco/CL:根[gen1]/smoke/mist/vapour/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/tobacco plant/(of the eyes) to be irritated by smoke

sentences.english: Vacuums carpets & empties ashtrays and urns.
sentences.chinese: 为地毯吸尘并倒空烟灰缸及金属容器。

sentences.english: The empty tins can be made into ashtrays.
sentences.chinese: 空罐头盒可以制成烟灰缸。

sentences.english: She threw an ashtray across the room, narrowly missing my head.
sentences.chinese: 她从房间那端扔过来一只烟灰缸，差点击中我的头。

sentences.english: He stubbed out his cigarette in the ashtray.
sentences.chinese: 他在烟灰缸内捻灭了他的香烟。

sentences.english: You can put your cigarette out in that ashtray.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在那个烟灰缸把香烟弄熄。

sentences.english: He then hands her a poorly crafted ashtray.
sentences.chinese: 他递给Sara一个制作粗糙的烟灰缸。
请给我一个烟灰缸好吗？

sentences.english: That waiter is so maladroit that he dropped the ashtray into my soup.
sentences.chinese: 那个服务员笨手笨脚，竟把烟灰缸掉到我的汤里。

sentences.english: This ashtray seems deep enough to hold all the cigarette ends in the world.
sentences.chinese: 这个烟灰缸深得似乎盛的下世界上所有的烟头。

sentences.english: The room is dense with papers, andcoffee cups and cigarettes overflow from ashtrays; there’s a partiallyarticulated snake skeleton on his desk.
sentences.chinese: 房间里堆满了纸和咖啡杯，烟蒂从烟灰缸里满了出来。

sentences.english: Y: So, Don, can you pass me that ashtray?
sentences.chinese: 能把那个烟灰缸递给我吗？
请阁下把烟头放在烟灰缸内。

sentences.english: Throw away all your cigarettes, lighters and ashtrays.
sentences.chinese: 扔了你所有的香烟，打火机和烟灰缸。

sentences.english: Two bottles and an ash-tray are on the shelf.
sentences.chinese: 架子上有两只瓶子和一只烟灰缸。

sentences.english: Ginny put an ashtray on his chest.
sentences.chinese: 琪妮在他胸膛上放了一个烟灰缸。

definition: small side table/coffee table/teapoy (ornamental tripod with caddies for tea)
see 打火機|打火机[da3 huo3 ji1]
